alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 2:23PM CST until January 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Agricultural land and low areas along and near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.2 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.0 Wed 2 pm CST 24.8 24.0 22.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 8 pM CST.
